name: Reality Strikes
description:
Log Line

Going viral can be deadly! Guide and influence your favorite content creator as she navigates a dangerous online challenge. Hype up the chat, uncover the mystery, and unlock three different endings based on your choices. 

Content Warnings

14+. Written and visible violence, death, depictions of blood.  Mild profanity.  Mentions of drugs/alcohol. Mentions of guns/weapons. 

Team Members

Writer/Director: E. Auten

Music: A.Hintzen

Asset Credits

Backgrounds - Rachel Chen & Uncle Mugen

Sprites - sutemo
